biotools.summary: OligoArray is free software that computes gene specific oligonucleotides for genome-scale oligonucleotide microarray construction. A database of pre-designed oligonucleotide microarray probes for organisms with a fully sequenced genome can be found at http://berry.engin.umich.edu/oligoarraydb/index.html
